dt: {bc}any of several small, wild, African and Eurasian pigeons (genus {it}Streptopelia{/it} and especially {it}S. turtur{/it}) noted for plaintive cooing

et: Middle English {it}turtul douve, turtill dowfe{/it} "the dove {it}Streptopelia turtur,{/it}" from {it}turtul, turtill{/it} {et_link|turtle:3|turtle:3} + {it}douve, dowfe{/it} {et_link|dove:1|dove:1}
shortdef: any of several small, wild, African and Eurasian pigeons (genus Streptopelia and especially S. turtur) noted for plaintive cooing

dt: {bc}a small pale dove ({it}Streptopelia risoria{/it}) that has a black ring around the sides and back of the neck, exists chiefly in domestication as a cage bird, and is probably of African origin

shortdef: a small pale dove (Streptopelia risoria) that has a black ring around the sides and back of the neck, exists chiefly in domestication as a cage bird, and is probably of African origin
